content.text:
[@runKleisli](@c5zFAmQ3pG8mzXc86oOmLiz9bKZeHO9KQCSazTWsMzo=.ed25519)

I think both of those are rolling release distributions, so as long as you're updating with `pacman -Syu` it shouldn't matter which version you installed. Sorry, I don't feel I'm being very helpful, maybe some context would help me answer your question?

Any version of Arch/Antergos should be fine, but if you get any errors during the installation please let me know.
